column5: Trailer is sitting on our circle drive in the historic district just walking distance to the downtown square! It sleeps 2- 3  Has air & heat, full & twin bed, frig, micro, sink, WiFi, TV, & DVD Trailer quest have access to a 3pc private bath in home. This bath is smartly appointed just for our trailer guest.   Just north of Dallas, McKinney is known for being a wonderful community, plenty of parks, a vibrant downtown area and If itâ€™s any testament to the town, Money Magazine #1 place to live!
